response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our exclusive product to you. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, and we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We are offering this product to you at an attractive price of $950,000. We understand its worth to you is $800,000, but we assure you that this offer represents a fair compromise that benefits both parties. Please let us know if you're interested in discussing further details or proceeding with the purchase. We look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 950000}
